## Conversion.Converter.withItemTypeGuard() method

Creates a [Converter](./ts-utils.converter.md) which applies a supplied type guard to each member of the conversion result from this converter.

**Signature:**

```typescript
withItemTypeGuard<TI>(guard: (from: unknown) => from is TI, message?: string): Converter<TI[], TC>;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

guard


</td><td>

(from: unknown) =&gt; from is TI


</td><td>

The type guard function to apply to each element.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

message


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Optional message to be reported if the type guard fails.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

[Converter](./ts-utils.converter.md)<!-- -->&lt;TI\[\], TC&gt;

A new [Converter](./ts-utils.converter.md) returning `<TI>`<!-- -->.

## Remarks

Fails if the conversion result is not an array or if any member fails the type guard.
